presentationTable.name: Base Facts
presentationTable.description: This folder contains Target Fact Metrics with different types of aggregations.

presentationColumns.name: Target Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Target Revenue from the Target Facts table, with a Sum aggregation
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Target Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Target Quantity from the Target Facts table with a Sum aggregation
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Target Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Target Unit Price by dividing Target Revenue by Target Units.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Target Unit Price

presentationColumns.name: Target Completion  (Rev Pct)
presentationColumns.description: Calculates the completion percentage by dividing Actual revenue by Target Revenue. The result is then multiplied by 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Target Completion  (Rev Pct)

presentationColumns.name: Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Actua Unit Price by dividing Revenue by Units.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Actual Unit Price
